sentences.english: I asked the strange boy, raising my eyebrows in curiosity.
sentences.chinese: 我好奇地扬起眉毛问这个奇怪的年轻人。

sentences.english: I crash-landed on a strange planet.
sentences.chinese: 我坠落在一个奇怪的星球。

sentences.english: The only oddity was the oxygen tanks.
sentences.chinese: 唯一奇怪的就是那些氧气罐。

sentences.english: He had seen no daily paper all week, and, strangely to him, felt no desire to see one.
sentences.chinese: 他已经一周没看报，令他奇怪的是，也并不想看。

sentences.english: In evolutionary systems theory these extremes are called "strange attractors".
sentences.chinese: 在进化系统理论这些级端被称为“奇怪的引资”。

sentences.english: You get to meet all sorts of really weird, interesting people.
sentences.chinese: 你会遇到各种奇怪又有趣的人。

sentences.english: These commence and criticism are inevitable and not at all surprizing.
sentences.chinese: 这些评论和批评是必然的，并不令人感到奇怪。

sentences.english: It's little surprise then that there's not much incentive for retailers and e-tailers to challenge the status quo.
sentences.chinese: 零售商和网售商挑战出新的动机不大，一点也不奇怪。

sentences.english: The village is no stranger to curious projects either.
sentences.chinese: 在华西村，各种奇奇怪怪的工程也不少见。

sentences.english: My English grandma saw my mum plant so many courgette and thought it was a bit strange.
sentences.chinese: 我奶奶见我妈种那么多西葫芦，觉得奇怪。

sentences.english: I wonder why Tatai bothered to set such a feast for me?
sentences.chinese: 奇怪，塔塔伊为什么要费事给我摆宴席？

sentences.english: But any oddness that you might perceive is superficial.
sentences.chinese: 但是您可以感觉到的任何奇怪的东西都是表面的。

sentences.english: Individual investors, on the other hand, are not so surprised at Hou's hasty retreat.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，散户们对侯宁的急流勇退并不感觉奇怪。

sentences.english: Nale:You have a program for sorcerers? Strange.
Holms is somehow a strange person.
sentences.chinese: 福尔摩斯是某种奇怪的人。

sentences.english: So Mary stood in the circle and then something strange happened.1
sentences.chinese: 于是玛丽站在了蘑菇圈里，接着奇怪的事发生了。

definition: to be amazed/to be surprised/to wonder
to be startled/to be shocked/to be amazed
to not understand/to be puzzled by/indissoluble
